pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hawk lets two parties securely communicate with each other usingmessages signed by a shared key.It is based on HTTP MAC access authentication (whichwas based on parts of OAuth 1.0).The Mohawk API is a little different from that of the Node library(i.e. https://github.com/hueniverse/hawk).It was redesigned to be more intuitive to developers, less prone to security problems, and more Pythonic.Read more: https://github.com/kumar303/mohawk/
